parameter.name: partyId
parameter.description: ID of the person or organisation.

parameter.name: trackId
parameter.description: Track ID for track to the new case as it is being created.

parameter.name: owner
parameter.description: The authenticated username to create case.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Status of the case.It defaults to OPEN, available options are OPEN, CLOSED.

parameter.name: closeDate
parameter.description: The case close date. Ignored unless status is CLOSED.
